channel.title: Connection problem? :(
channel.description: ok...i made server it works and everything im owner and all tht stuff. Its hamachi and i hav the hamachi thing up and everything....when other ppl join the hamachi and try to log in it says "error connecting to server"...plz help me

item.title: Connection problem? :(
item.dc:creator: @aquatizscape aquatizscape
item.description:
@aquatizscape wrote:

this is because you are not port forwarded right, or that you have your server file ip set as 127.0.0.1, or 0.0.0.0
Search for one of those ip in your files, and change to your servers ip.
hope i helped!

Read full topic
